comment_body: I could see this happening in the town I grew up in, which truly makes it sad and scary.

In retirement, my parents moved moved to a really small remote town. A few years ago I was talking to my mom about police brutality.

"The neighbors told us that a couple decades ago the cops here killed some guy, and they covered it up, but he was a drug user so it didn't matter."

Fuuuuu...
